CustomField.formula:
IF(
AND(Available_Capacity__c > 0, load_zone_check_needed__c = FALSE),
"Good News! There is an open project in your area!",
IF(load_zone_check_needed__c = TRUE,
"We're sorry, we cannot determine availability based on your location. Please apply and we will get back to you. Thank you!",
"Unfortunately we have run out of capacity in your area, please check back soon!"))
CustomField.label: XXXXX Zip Code Qualification
